dataList.content: Now, if you are prepared, do explain what you see in the mirror. You needn’t haste.
For some reason, Xichun appeared to hesitate before the mirror.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Hey, you know...

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... it's been a while since I looked into the mirror for so long.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: My lady, do you recall Sunzhen, of the Shi family who contacted you for a meeting?

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Yeah, the guy who said he was gonna show me a precious flower that blooms only at night? I remember that you were vehemently against me going out there, so I stayed inside. I wonder what kind of flower it was...

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: ... Don't tell me you were actually looking forward to meeting him, my lady?

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: ... Oh, of course not.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: You were wise to stay inside.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: It was revealed that you weren't the only person who was invited, my lady. That vile man had hired a group of assassins to ambush the meeting spot, and would have been waiting there to spring the trap had you gone.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: But, apparently, he was outplayed and had his limbs and head torn off as punishment. What a relief, isn't it?

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: ... I guess.

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: I'm glad I didn't go, Wei. You were right.

dataList.title: Xichun's Clan
dataList.content: ... If only you still had the Wu branch under your control—

dataList.title: Jia Family
dataList.content: Stop it. We agreed to move on from that, remember? We don't have to talk about it.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I was brushing my hair and looking in the mirror as we were talking, but...

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... I realized that I no longer recognized the girl in the mirror.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I don't know why, but I just... I found it so hard to meet her eyes.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: But I brushed it off, because I had to. An experience like that was going to be a common occurrence anyway, and the Family Hierarch war was always looming on the horizon.
Perhaps what you felt then may have been... shame.
But it is paramount to face oneself nonetheless. Nay, especially so if it was.
And Sinclair—what do you see?
I see...
... Well, I just see myself smiling... I don't see what's... so out of the ordinary...?
But it seemed like Sinclair couldn't really bring himself to face the mirror.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Hey, after what we just discussed, I think... I think I understand something now.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Now that I've had some quiet time looking at my reflection, I think I uncovered a part of myself I've had hidden away for a long time.
